metadata.name: File Explorer Folder Opened Using Explorer Folder Shortcut Via Shell
metadata.comment: Detects the initial execution of "cmd.exe" which spawns "explorer.exe" with the appropriate command line arguments for opening the "My Computer" folder.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell:mycomputerfolder')))

output.summary: Detects the initial execution of "cmd.exe" which spawns "explorer.exe" with the appropriate command line arguments for opening the "My Computer" folder.
